original: Berglund, Helmer, chefredaktör, Motala, f. 14/5/90 i Lerbäcks förs., Örebro 1., av Edvard B. o. Lovisa Wilhelmina Gustafs’s0n. G. m. Ester Maria Persson. Barn: Arne f. 21, jur. kand. — Medarb. i Nerikes Tidn. 10-16, chefred, f. Bärgslagspo^sten 16-26, grund. Motala Tidn. 26, dess chef o. ansv. utg., chefred, f. östgöten 31-33. Led. av stads-fullm. i Motala, tillhörde drätselkamm. i Lindes’berg. Medl. av Sv. tidn :utg:fören. o. Publ:kl. m. fl. organisationer, div. uppdr. i styr. o. ndr. Hed:led. i Lerbäcks hemb:fören. Föret, vidsträckta utr. res. även efter kriget. Förf. t. bok m. jakt- o. fis-keskildr. Innehaft egend. Vibäck i Karlskoga.
translated: Berglund, Helmer, editor-in-chief, Motala, born May 14, 1890 in Lerbäcks parish, Örebro county, son of Edvard B. and Lovisa Wilhelmina Gustafsson. Married to Ester Maria Persson in the year 19xx. Children: Arne, born in 1921, a law graduate. Worked at Nerikes Tidning from 1910-1916, editor of Bärgslagsposten from 1916-1926, founded Motala Tidning in 1926, served as its chief editor and publisher. Also served as editor of Östgöten from 1931-1933. Member of the municipal council in Motala, served on the finance committee in Lindesberg. Member of Swedish Newspaper Publishers Association and Publicists Club, among other organizations and boards. Honorary member of Lerbäcks Hembygdsförening. Traveled extensively, even after the war. Author of a book on hunting and fishing. Owned the property Vibäck in Karlskoga.

structured.name: Helmer Berglund
structured.description: Author of a book on hunting and fishing. Owned the property Vibäck in Karlskoga.
